member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_WRITER_PAYLOAD_STREAM
member.summary: Contains the data and metadata of files to write into the app package.

member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_WRITER_PAYLOAD_STREAM.inputStream
member.summary: The source of the payload file.

member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_WRITER_PAYLOAD_STREAM.contentType
member.summary: The content type of the payload file.

member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_WRITER_PAYLOAD_STREAM.compressionOption
member.summary: The degree of compression used for the file in the package.
